Commands.Snatch Shot: Ranged BRV attackOccasionally steals random enhancement from target
Commands.Great Aim: BRV 1.3 + HP attackOccasionally steals random enhancement from target

Artifacts.BRV Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV.
Artifacts.Rapid Speed: Raises Speed by 10% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Mighty Snatch Shot: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Snatch Shot by 10%.
Artifacts.Bravery Great Aim: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Great Aim.

Passives.Snatch Shot Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Snatch Shot.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Great Aim Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Great Aim.
Passives.Snatch Shot Charge: Increases the max uses of Snatch Shot by 1.
Passives.Great Aim Charge: Increases the max uses of Great Aim by 1.
Passives.Buff Collector: Slightly raises Max BRV when at least two buffs are granted.
Passives.Fastest Sky Pirate: Slightly raises Speed for 2 turns and grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Speed Down debuff for 2 turns, after a BRV Attack.

Weapons.Capella CP: 35: Raises Great Aim's BRV multiplier to 1.4.Removes 3 debuffs following their order of infliction.Raises the success rate of buff stealing and increases the stealing limit by 2.Extends the duration of stolen buffs.
Weapons.Aldebaran CP: 15: Increases the potency of Snatch Shot.Raises the success rate of buff stealing.Extends the duration of any stolen buff.
